description: Allows network ingress to a cache security group. Applications using ElastiCache must be running on Amazon EC2, and Amazon EC2 security groups are used as the authorization mechanism.

parameters.name: CacheSecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The cache security group that allows network ingress.

parameters.name: EC2SecurityGroupName
parameters.description: The Amazon EC2 security group to be authorized for ingress to the cache security group.

parameters.name: EC2SecurityGroupOwnerId
parameters.description: The Amazon account number of the Amazon EC2 security group owner. Note that this is not the same thing as an Amazon access key ID - you must provide a valid Amazon account number for this parameter.

nested_items.name: CacheSecurityGroup
nested_items.description: Represents the output of one of the following operations:
